subject: Re: [junit] How to remove a testMethod from TestSuite
msgSnippet: ... I don t know that this is possible. Describe the reason for removing a test /as tests execute/. Why can t you do it by building the test suite differently
messageBody:
Dan Tran wrote:

> Hello, I have a need to dynamically remove a test
> method out of a TestSuite given to me at run time.
>
> I also know about the full class name and method name
> of the tobe removed test method.
>
> The TestSuite api has a method to return an
> enumaration of Test. This is where I should start?
>
> Thanks for all advices

I don't know that this is possible. Describe the reason for removing a
test /as tests execute/. Why can't you do it by building the test suite
differently before then?
--
J. B. Rainsberger,
Diaspar Software Services
http://www.diasparsoftware.com :: +1 416 791-8603
Let's write software that people understand
